trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Brooksville
There were no other sightings in Brooksville on or around August 31st 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking my dog around 945pm in 2008 saw a bright ball of light like a distant star in the sky moving slowly in the distance going behind the tree in my yard when it did not come out of the other side of the tree i went to the tree to see why did not see the bright round light nothing around then above my head about 25-35 feet was this wing object transparent you could see inside. on the leading edge inside of it it looked like little figures all along the edge of the wing looked like they were moving as it glided silently by no lites or sound i watched as it disapeared into the nite sky. till this day every so often like last nite this bright round orb comes out and moves so slow in the distant sky looks like a star but stops i think it sees me when i take out the dog in the backyard at 10pm sometimes it folllows me if i walk the dog to the front of the house or down the block then when i go to the back of the house its there its very weird saw it again last nite.it happens quite often what does it want?
Summary: above my head a wing shaped craft transparent no sound or lites moving slow
